# ClearFolio Review

ClearFolio Review is an independent, document-based review service.

Purpose:
- Provide structured, checklist-driven document review summaries
- Clarify scope, limitations, and observations in written form

Scope:
- Document presence
- Visible internal consistency
- Stated validity or expiry information

Limitations:
- No compliance assessment
- No certification or approval
- No verification of authenticity or safety

Data handling:
- Time-bound retention
- No reuse of documents
- No model training on client data

Website:
https://clearfolioreview.com

Contact:
contact@clearfolioreview.com
